content.title: Rwanda High Court clears opposition leader of charges - Citizen TV
Kagame critic Diane Rwigara 'not guilty' of inciting insurrection - Daily Nation
content.desc: The prosecution's charges were baseless, judges say.

content.title: Djibouti port eyes Rwanda and Burundi, to resume services to South Sudan - Business Daily
content.desc: The port, which already serves Ethiopia, also aims at serving Burundi and Rwanda.

content.title: US congress members want Rwanda to drop Kagame rival charges - The Star, Kenya
content.desc: A group of US Congress members have called on the Rwandan government to drop charges against Diane Rwigara, a government critic who is facing up to 22 ...

content.title: Rwanda blacklists over 1,000 skin bleaching products - The Standard
content.desc: 1343 skin bleaching products have been blacklisted as they are believed to contain high levels of hydroquinone, which exposes users to skin cancer.
